1.1.name: wordpress/easycode
1.1.description:
• It can help you to show your code in a better way.
  • It has some functions to help people to read code easilier.
  • You can choose a style that fits your blog.

(PHP,C++,JavaScript,VB or others)

After installation,you can put your code into your blog.

Please write:
[code]
* a ordered list (<ol>) *
[/code]

HTML:
[code]
<ol>
<li> - PHP,C++,JavaScript,VB or others - </li>
<li>Some code</li>
...... </ol> [/code]

please look at Screenshots

So Easy! And you can also change its options in Setting Center.
